first_para: Dominic Rennie Raab (born 25 February 1974) is a British Conservative politician. He is the Member of Parliament for Esher and Walton in Surrey and is a former international business lawyer.

full.extract:
Dominic Rennie Raab (born 25 February 1974) is a British Conservative politician. He is the Member of Parliament for Esher and Walton in Surrey and is a former international business lawyer.
^ "Dominic Raab MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ "List of Members returned to serve in Parliament at the General Election 2010". London Gazette. 13 May 2010. Retrieved 2 June 2010.
full.title: Dominic Raab
